title: Lesson 1: Hello World!
content: Learn how to write your first Python program.
instructions: Write a Python program to print 'Hello, World!'.

title: Lesson 2: Variables and Data Types
content: Learn about variables and data types in Python.
instructions: Create variables to store your name, age, and favorite color.

title: Lesson 3: Loops and Conditionals
content: Learn how to use loops and conditionals in Python.
instructions: Write a Python program to print numbers from 1 to 10 using a loop.
